name: Dot Number: Color Line
description:
Dot Number: Color Line!!!
Tap the dots and drag your finger to connect the sequential path in the puzzle. Be clever and fast to get higher score.

Features:

high dotcolor graphics that give natural colour effect.
Easy to play with smooth display.
Thousands of new levels are includes in it with many counting numbers.
Free to play for all ages like young children etc.
Infinite training for your brain if you play this puzzle game.
